message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.MM. 

The paper proposes a method for retrieval-based product recommendation, which involves leveraging both product content information (textual descriptions and images) and collaborative filtering signal. This suggests that the paper could belong to several sub-categories, including Information Retrieval (cs.IR), Machine Learning (cs.LG), Computer Vision (cs.CV), Computational Linguistics (cs.CL), and Multimedia (cs.MM). Among these, cs.IR is the most likely category as the paper focuses on retrieval-based recommendation, which is a core topic in IR. The paper also involves machine learning techniques for embedding fusion, which makes cs.LG a likely category as well. The use of images in product representation suggests cs.CV as a possible category, while the use of textual descriptions suggests cs.CL. Finally, the use of multimedia data in general suggests cs.MM as a possible category.
